channel.title: ★★SMH Ultra Advanced Help Utility Tool★★ [BRAND NEW RSPS PRIVATE SERVER TOOL]
channel.description:
Yes, its true. I got my own Programs. I figured out how to make batch stuff, a.k.a. programs. I made something called SMH which stands for Server Making Help. It will help you make a server if you use it. The download links are below. Version 1.0-4.0 are not shown. SMH 7.0 Here. Its my SMH version 7.0, including more in the misc menu. http://www.freewebs.com/linscape/SMH%207.0 DOWNLOAD VERSION 6.0 Here is version 6.0. Ill also include a screenshot. http://www.freewebs.com/linscape/SMH%206.0.bat [img]http://www.freewebs.com/linscape/SMH%206.0.bmp[/img] DOWNLOAD VERSION 5.0 This is a link to download version 5.0. THERE ARE NO VIRUSES ATTACHED TO IT!!! I however suggest you scan, just in case. But I didnt attach any (I dont know how :P) so its up to you. So here is the link, and a screen shot. http://www.freewebs.com/linscape/SMH%205.0.bat Here is the screen shot of the latest version, which is currently 5.0. [img]http://www.freewebs.com/linscape/SMH%205.0.bmp[/img] Credits 10% irc 10% Lin 15% drubrkletern 10% classic committing suicide 95% jagex 30% me enjoy :cool: VOUCHES FOR MY OWRK
"omg dis is gr8 rep++"
i vouch for this masterpiece too thanks ill add 2 thread it's a great technology which will define the next generation of rsps
[img]http://i.imgur.com/Oys57Zr.jpg[/img]
